summary: This document is an email chain from September 27, 2019, regarding the FBI Victim Services Division organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It includes a forwarded invitation for victims to attend meetings in New York or Florida in October 2019 to learn about available victim services. The email also mentions attorney Gloria Allred.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned as an attorney to whom the briefing email should be sent, indicating her involvement in representing victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing in New York
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Briefing in Florida
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Florida.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in September 2019 to offer support services.
Briefings were scheduled for October 15, 2019, in New York and October 23, 2019, in Florida, indicating a multi-state effort to assist victims.
Attorney Gloria Allred is referenced, suggesting her involvement in representing Epstein victims.
The email indicates the investigation was active as of September 2019, with victim services being coordinated by the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Participation was limited to the victim and one support person, highlighting the sensitive and confidential nature of the briefings.
